Package gov.niarl.his.privacyca

This package contains all base classes that are used by the HIS Privacy CA and Client Provisioner.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TpmKeySubParams
    Interface for the sub-parameters, as used in a TPM_KEY_PARMS structure.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HisIdentityProvisioner
    This is part 2 of 3 for fully provisioning HIS on a Windows client.
    HisRegisterIdentity
    This is part 3 of 3 for fully provisioning HIS on a Windows client.
    HisSetup Deprecated
    This method will create all new files for a HIS deployment.
    IdentityOS  
    idResponse
    This class is needed to provide a return type for the utils.processIdentityRequest function that includes both the Symmetric and Asymmetric parts of the Privacy CA's response.
    LPSliveCdPrep
    This class is used to setup an LPS bootable CD.
    RegisterPrivacyCa Deprecated
    This class is to be used for registration of the Privacy CA to the HIS appraiser.
    TpmAsymCaContents
    This class is the Java version of the C-style structure TPM_ASYM_CA_CONTENTS, as specified by the TCG.
    TpmClient
    This class provides macro-level client provisioning functions, such as taking ownership, provisioning the EC, and creating a new identity key.
    TpmIdentity
    This class was created to hole all return values for running collateIdentityRequest.
    TpmIdentityProof
    See TPM_IDENTITY_PROOF
    TpmIdentityRequest
    The TpmIdentityRequest class is based on the TPM_IDENTITY_REQUEST structure and includes associated methods.
    TpmIntegrityReport
    This class was created to test the functionality the TPM Module quote routine.
    TpmIntegrityReport.PCR
    This holds a single PCR value.
    TpmKey
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_KEY structure.
    TpmKeyParams
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_KEY_PARMS structure.
    TpmModule
    The TpmModule class is a Java front end for C++ utilities that work directly with the TSS for interfacing with the TPM.
    TpmPubKey
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_PUBKEY structure.
    TpmRsaKeyParams
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_RSA_KEY_PARMS structure.
    TpmSymCaAttestation
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_SYM_CA_ATTESTATION structure.
    TpmSymmetricKey
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_SYMMETRIC_KEY structure.
    TpmSymmetricKeyParams
    This class is for the TCG's TPM_SYMMETRIC_KEY_PARMS structure.
    TpmUtils
    The utils class contains functions that fall into two categories: those that provide utility to other classes in this package; and those that perform some cross-class functionality that is specific to this package.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PrivacyCaException
    This exception is intended to be used to throw Privacy CA-specific exceptions.
    TpmIntegrityReport.TpmIntegrityReportException  
    TpmModule.TpmModuleException  
    TpmUtils.TpmBytestreamResouceException
    This error is thrown when attempting to read more bytes from a bytestream or array than are available to read.
    TpmUtils.TpmUnsignedConversionException
    This exception is thrown to indicate an error in converting between a signed and an unsigned number of equal bit-lengths.

Package gov.niarl.his.privacyca Description

This package contains all base classes that are used by the HIS Privacy CA and Client Provisioner.
